sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> in the shape of a <radical>dragon</radical> flies off the cliff, then comes crashing down to the ground. This skinny tsunami of water flying down to the ground is a <kanji>waterfall</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Can you see why a tsunami dragon (especially the Asian skinny snake-like kind) could be a waterfall? Try to imagine it.
readingMnemonic: Despite how cool a dragon <kanji>waterfall</kanji> is, to be honest it's also pretty <reading>tacky</reading> (<ja>たき</ja>).
readingInfo: Now imagine it being a bit tacky. Dragons are alright but... you just don't want to overdo it, you know?
